q1.name: Bouncing Bomb
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Ziggs''' throws a bouncing bomb at the target area, which explodes upon hitting an enemy, colliding with terrain, or reaching the end of its trajectory. The bomb can bounce up to two times, the distance traveled each time based on how far it was originally thrown.
The bomb's explosion deals {{as|magic damage}} to all nearby enemies.
''Bouncing Bomb'' will cast at max range if cast beyond that.
q1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Ziggs throws a bouncing bomb at the target area, which explodes upon hitting an enemy, colliding with terrain, or reaching the end of its trajectory. The bomb can bounce up to two times, the distance traveled each time based on how far it was originally thrown.
The bomb's explosion deals magic damage to all nearby enemies.
Bouncing Bomb will cast at max range if cast beyond that.
q1.notes:
* ''Bouncing Bomb'' obeys game physics (can be thrown or bounce over units/terrain if there is sufficient air time).
* ''Bouncing Bomb'' may go over enemies without exploding (will do so if it lands against walls).
* {{tip|Spell shield}} can block both the bomb's impact and its explosion (blocking the former will block but not prevent the latter).
* '''Ziggs''' will always throw the bomb from his position.

w1.name: Satchel Charge
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Ziggs''' flings an explosive charge towards the target area, {{tip|sight|revealing}} its surroundings, and exploding after 4 seconds. ''Satchel Charge'' can be recast at no delay.

When exploding, the ''Satchel Charge'' deals {{as|magic damage}} and {{tip|airborne|knocks back}} all surrounding enemies by 250 units. If '''Ziggs''' is within the explosion radius, he {{tip|dash|dashes}} up to 500 units away.

{{Cci|Satchel Charge Turret Explosion Indicator.png|border=false||{{sbc|Turret Explosion:}}}} ''Satchel Charge's'' explosion can {{ccs|demolish|magic}} {{tip|turrets}} below a {{sti|health|{{as|'''percentile''' health}}}} threshold.
{{sbc|Recast:}} '''Ziggs''' detonates ''Satchel Charge'' early. If recast while in flight, the ability will detonate immediately upon landing.
'''Ziggs''' does not {{tip|dash}} if he is {{tip|immobilize|immobilized}} or {{tip|ground|grounded}}.
w1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Ziggs flings an explosive charge towards the target area, revealing its surroundings, and exploding after 4 seconds. Satchel Charge can be recast at no delay.
When exploding, the Satchel Charge deals magic damage and knocks back all surrounding enemies by 250 units. If Ziggs is within the explosion radius, he dashes up to 500 units away.
Turret Explosion:">Unknown value: Cci Satchel Charge Turret Explosion Indicator.png border=false Turret Explosion: Satchel Charge's explosion can Unknown value: ccs demolish magic turrets below a percentile health threshold.
Recast: Ziggs detonates Satchel Charge early. If recast while in flight, the ability will detonate immediately upon landing.
Ziggs does not dash if he is immobilized or grounded.
w1.notes:
*The initial cast counts as an ability activation for the purposes of on-cast effects such as {{nie|Spellblade}} and stacking {{ai|Force Pulse|Kassadin}}.
**Detonating the ability manually does not.
* ''Satchel Charge's'' distance increases with proximity to the charge, resulting in being knocked straight up when aligned directly on top of it.
* '''Ziggs''' will not ''dash'' from ''Satchel Charge's'' detonation while {{si|Teleport|Teleporting}} but he will while {{si|Recall|Recalling}}.

effects.str: • Demolition Threshold: % of turret's maximum health

e1.name: Hexplosive Minefield
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Ziggs''' scatters a cluster of 11 proximity mines over the target area, lasting for up to 10 seconds.
Mines explode on contact with an enemy, {{tip|slow|slowing}} them for {{fd|1.5}} seconds and dealing {{as|magic damage}}. Targets detonating more than one mine take 40% damage from subsequent mines.
e1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Ziggs scatters a cluster of 11 proximity mines over the target area, lasting for up to 10 seconds.
Mines explode on contact with an enemy, slowing them for 1.5 seconds and dealing magic damage. Targets detonating more than one mine take 40% damage from subsequent mines.
e1.notes:
* ''Hexplosive Minefield'' grants {{tip|sight}} of the target area for a short duration (on-cast and when each mine explodes).
* {{tip|Spell shield}} will block a single instance of damage.

r1.name: Mega Inferno Bomb
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Ziggs''' hurls a massive bomb at the target area, granting {{tip|sight}} within a 350 unit radius as it travels to its destination.
Upon reaching the location, it explodes, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to all enemies caught in the blast, increased by 50% in the epicenter.
